title: Integrative Mind Body Medicine - Chicago, IL
description: Specialties: Holistic Medical Clinic that treats acute and chronic physical and emotional health issues through Chinese Medicine. Offering Acupuncture, Shiatsu, Massage Therapy, Cupping, and Chinese Herbal Therapy to treat conditions such as Sinus Conditions, Allergies, Respiratory Conditions, Neurological issues, Migraines and Headaches, Chronic and Acute Body Pain, Women's Health Issues, Anxiety and Depression, Insomnia, PTSD, and Gastro-intestinal issues.

Recommended Reviews [Learn more about reviews.](https://www.yelp.com/reviews-trust-link-tree?l=en_US) Overall rating 5 stars 4 stars 3 stars 2 stars 1 star - 2/26/2021First to Review 10/10!! I highly recommend Liz and her amazing skills to anyone who is willing to try acupuncture. A doctor recommended acupuncture to me last year and I was so ready to finally feel better, I put my fear of needles and fear of trying something new aside. To say that going to see Liz was life changing is an understatement. I am so glad that I tried it and keep going back. Liz is kind, thorough and patient. She understands when I'm not ready to try something new and lets me negotiate - knowing that the following appointment I am usually ready. She listens to everything I have to say and I truly appreciate her mind and body approach to my wellness and healthy life. And I feel safe continuing treatment with her during the pandemic. What are you waiting for?!? Try it and see for yourself! You Might Also
